action.primary: Nourishes Yin, invigorates the spleen and promotes digestion

indications: Abdominal pain, Leukorrhea, sores, dysentery, infantile malnutrition, gastrectasia
Indigestion due to Liver Qi Stagnation

notes: This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
Ity is also said to enhance immunity.
This herb is also known as Bai Shou Wu.
